notes.text: List: Internet Explorer 9 truncation handling for the content corrected
Button: DesignTime behavior added
SemanticPage: Worklist example updated
InputListItem: labelTextDirection property added to fully support RTL (right-to-left) mode
TextArea: valueLiveUpdate property added
Dialog: Explored app samples improved
Dialog: Resize and drag feature enabled
InputBase: Screen Reader support for value state added
MessageStrip: New control implemented
MultiInput: Copy and Paste feature enabled
ObjectListItem: Creating title text control no longer causes re-rendering
ObjectListItem: Screen Reader Support added
Panel: backgroundDesign property added
Popover: New placement types added
Token, Tokenizer: Screen Reader Support added
UploadCollection: API fileDeleted implemented
UploadCollection: API fileSizeExceed implemented
UploadCollection: API fix for change implemented
UploadCollection: API fix for fileDeleted implemented
UploadCollection: API fix for fileNameLengthExceed implemented
UploadCollection: API fix for uploadComplete implemented
UploadCollection: fileRenamed event added
UploadCollection: API JSDoc updated
semantic.SemanticPage: New set of semantic controls implemented
sinon: Included the latest version 1.14.1
MessagePage: showNavButton property and navButtonPress event added
routing.RouteMatchedHandler: setCloseDialogs now forwards the property to the targetHandler
Existence of namespace during Core.initLibrary() ensured
'response' function of sample MockServer corrected
JSDoc issues reported during nightly build solved
Focus on pull-to-refresh button now works for Internet Explorer
Input: removeAggreagtion now returns correct value
MessagePage, OverflowToolbar, SemanticControls: Metamodel description added
Popover: Calculation offset corrected
Routing API Documentation: The missing or incorrect @lends tags corrected
SegmentedButton: Check for undefined button in removeButton function corrected
TDG App: Encoding of German locale (ISO-8859-1) corrected
Table Breadcrumb sample: Order of execution issue solved
ResponsivePopover: Title is now bound at first opening of the sample application in the Demo Kit
CustomListItem: Text selection is now allowed
FlexBox: Error in Internet Explorer 9 avoided when parent is an UIComponent
ListBase: Swipe content changes no longer invalidates the list
Table: Cell content now decides overflow handling
Table: Popin content is now announced by screen readers
ActionSheet: The control no longer reacts to content size change
Bar: Issue when used in the context of the Dialog control  solved
ComboBox: Input events of read-only fields suppressed (Internet Explorer 11)
ComboBoxBase: Overlapping issue of the text on Internet Explorer 10 solved (sap_bluecrystal theme)
m.DatePicker, ui.commons.DatePicker: Keyboard navigation issues corrected
DateRangeSelection: Change is no longer fired if it's not changed
Dialog: Compact size is now applicable with onDialog style
Dialog: Drag now depends on the draggable property
Dialog: Explored app no longer points to missing files
Dialog: Keyboard no longer blinks on mobile
Dialog: Opening animation is changed from CSS to jQuery animation
Dialog: The control no longer forces line-height on icons
FeedListItem: Delete and Edit buttons are no longer displayed at the end of the line
FeedListItem: Sender is no longer followed by colon
GrowingEnablement: Build from scratch when there is no data
IconTabBar: Invalidation flow corrected
IconTabBar: Left padding is now correct
IconTabBar: The first text is no longer clipped on mobile devices when the first filter is 'showAll:true'
Input: ValueHelp icon size in compact mode changed
Input: Typo corrected to disable selection remembering
Input: ValueHelp icon is no longer on wrong position if description is used
Input: Width of F4 button adjusted on compact mode
Input: Delayed calls are now cleaned up when control is destroyed
Input: Suggestion popup no longer used on tablets
Input: Suggestion only opened if minimal input is made
Label: Aria-required attribute set
List: Internet Explorer 9 truncation handling for the content corrected
ListBase: ItemNavigation is no longer destroyed
MessageBox: Screen Reader improved
MessagePopover: Duplicate icon in compact mode corrected
MultiComboBox: Usage of empty strings as selected key allowed
MultiComboBox: Popup is no longer closed on first chosen token
MultiInput: MultiInput border padding adjusted
MultiInput: Token style adjusted in High-Contrast Black theme, to align with BlueCrystal theme
MultiInput: Suggestion popup no longer used on tablets
MultiInput: Copy and Paste improved with suggestion items
MultiInput: Focus setting for tokenChange event improved
MultiInput: Keyboard handling of multi-line MultiInput improved
MultiInput: Suggestion in phone mode improved
MultiInput: Token multi-line display in popup dialog improved
MultiInput: Closing multi-line of MultiInput in the explored example corrected
MultiInput: Indicator issue in mobile solved
MultiInput: Placeholder covering ValueHelp button in Internet Explorer corrected
MultiInput: Expanded multi-line MultiInput is now working inside SimpleForm
NavContainer: No longer removes the removed pages from the navigation stack
NavContainer: Memory behavior improved when app has a leak
Page: NavButton now has a tooltip
Page: setBusy overlays header+footer, add 'contentOnlyBusy'
Panel: Support for nested panels added
Popover: Check for empty nav container added
Popover: Control is no longer closed if virtual keyboard is open and 'of' element is no longer out of viewport
Popover: Arrow color corrected
Popover: Content wrapper now has a minimum width of 100%
PullToRefresh: Focus indicator with High-Contrast Black theme added
RadioButtonGroup: Selected index issue solved
SegmentedButton - API property selectedKey is now updated correctly
SelectDialog: Remember selection after cancel button pressed issue solved
SplitContainer: Hamburger button is now adapted when page shows/hides back button
SplitContainer: Master area now can't be closed when switched from ShowHide to Hide
SplitContainer: preventDefault now cancels navigation
Table: Table header row is no longer visible when all column headers are invisible
TablePersoDialog: Initial Focus with grouping corrected
Text: When text in editable form is empty min-height is added
Title, Label: Margin in transparent toolbar context for Bluecrystal and High-Contrast Black theme corrected
Tokenizer: Token truncation no longer affects only token text
UploadCollection.less: Incorrect rendering of attributes fixed
UploadCollection: API of typeMissmatch updated
UploadCollection: Adaptation of data type and documentation of maximumFileSize property corrected
UploadCollection: CSS adaptated for the first and last list item in the way that the space between the items fits
UploadCollection: Call of Method setFileType with undefined parameter no longer triggers an error
UploadCollection: Default tooltip of the fileUploader suppressed
UploadCollection: Filename without any dot now possible
UploadCollection: JSDoc updated
UploadCollection: The focus on filename is now visible
UploadCollection: Buttons no longer overlap the text at resizing
UploadCollection: Files from 'linkedDocuments' folder added to metadata of the Demo Kit example
UploadCollection: Property sameFileNameAllowed corrected
ViewSettingsDialog: Sorting options are now clearly separated
ViewSettingsDialog: Initial focus in filter details page corrected
ViewSettingsDialog: Initial focus is set to the first focusable item of the current page
FacetFilter: Remove icon issue solved
sap.m.RadioButton: Selecting more than one RadioButton with same groupName fixed
sap.m.MessageBox: Added new functions error(), information(), warning(), success()
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Copy & Paste token added
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Added support of alt tag on title image
sap.m.ObjectHeader: All instances of sap.m.Link now can be included as an attribute
sap.m.PullToRefresh: Screen reader support implemented
sap.m.QuickView: New control added
sap.m.ScrollContainer, sap.m.Page: scrollToElement functionality added
sap.m.UploadCollection: Additional attributes implemented
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Implemented support for custom tabs
sap.m.FeedListItem: Accessibility test-page added
Removed broken md-template link from Demokit demo apps page
sap.m.ActionSheet: Implemented scrolling for the whole page when run on Android stock browserr
sap.m.ActionSheet: Fixed the height of ActionSheet on phones
sap.m.Bar:  Search field has the correct value in sub header bar
sap.m.BusyDialog: BusyDialog gets the focus after it's opened
sap.m.Button: Fixed focus outline drawn on mobile devices
sap.m.Button: Added tooltip should on disabled buttons
sap.m.Button: Unstyled icon is no longer displayed out of the button itself
sap.m.Column: Unit conversion fixed for demand pop-in
sap.m.DatePicker: Long text no longer placed over picker icon in Internet Explorer 9/10
sap.m.Dialog: Resizing does not trigger reposition anymore
sap.m.Dialog: Improvements for setting dimensions implemented
sap.m.Dialog: The dialog will reposition itself after content changes
sap.m.FeedListItem: 'More' or 'Less' link works now as expected after rerender.
sap.m.IconTabBar: IconTabHeader selectedKey bubbles update up to parent IconTabBar
sap.m.IconTabBar: Selected tab gets the focus now
sap.m.IconTabBar: When the IconTabBar is within ObjectHeader, 'setText' is working correctly now
sap.m.Image/core.Icon: Accessibility of Image and Icon control improved
sap.m.Input: FireFox validation visualization removed
sap.m.InputBase: Buggy input event detection added
sap.m.Link: Link without href doesn't trigger beforeunload anymore
sap.m.List: Support for old columns aggregation added
sap.m.ListBase: Active state is no longer affected from list mode
sap.m.ListBase: Apply the focus info correctly after rendering
sap.m.MessageBox: The "details" property now supports JSON
sap.m.MessagePopover: Initial state is loaded when the control is closed and re-opened
sap.m.MultiInput: Enhancde layout for multi-line multi-input in smart table
sap.m.MultiInput: Fixed multi-line MultiInput expand issue in layout
sap.m.MultiInput: Value for tokenizer indicator no longer used
sap.m.Panel: Focused icon now has proper border placement
sap.m.PersoDialog: Added tooltips to up and down buttons
sap.m.Popover: Arrow color corrected when NavContainer has a header
sap.m.Popover: Focus kept inside the Popover in Firefox
sap.m.QuickView: Fixed example in Explored app
sap.m.RadioButton: RadioButton is not removed from old group when setGroupName is called
sap.m.RadioButton: Selecting more than one RadioButton with same groupName fixed
sap.m.RadioButtonGroup: RadioButtonGroup issues fixed
sap.m.ResponsivePopover: Added origin parameter to close events
sap.m.SegmentedButton: The screen reader now works correct when you have sap icon in a button or all buttons contain only sap icons
sap.m.Select: Fixed infinite loop in change event
sap.m.Select: Selected item correctly updated when calling setters on items
sap.m.SplitContainer: Hamburger button is shown when back button in detail header is invisible
sap.m.Table: Popin focus reflected to main row
sap.m.Tile: Fixed handling of events onsapspace and onsapenter
sap.m.Token: Token deletion on a combi-device fixed
sap.m.UploadCollection: Issues in edit mode in combination with other UI activities fixed; Text in the delete file popup changed
sap.m.UploadCollection: Link to open the attachment triggered correctly
sap.m.UploadCollection: Firefox bugs with buttons and file name corrected
sap.m.UploadCollection: Rendering of uploaded items corrected
sap.m.UploadCollection: Rendering of uploaded items corrected
jQuery 2.1.4 added but not yet as default version
Image: Support setting the src to background-image CSS style
MessagePopover: Asynchronous loading of content and asynchronous validation of content links implemented
OverflowToolbar: Additional controls can be moved to the overflow
Wizard: New control implemented
sap.ui.table.Table: Explored sample infrastructure prepared and basic example provided
Popover: The click event is no longer passed through the Popover arrow
BusyDialog: Javascript error avoided when calling API method after destroyed
Button: Default icon tooltip prevented if text is present
Button: Press event is fired after the focusin event
ComboBox: BlackBerry 10 typeahead issue (browser bug) resolved
ComboBox: Picker and input widths are now synchronized on resize event
DateTimeInput: Dialog now opens on tap
Dialog: Delayed set of height and width now works
Dialog: Initial width and height are now set in the renderer
Dialog: The footer html in desktop and phone devices is now unified
IconTabBar: Scrolling arrows are now updated properly when using keyboard navigation
MultiComboBox: High Contrast Black theme no longer has too much padding
MultiComboBox: Rendering improved
MultiComboBox: Placeholder is no longer visible when tokens are chosen
ObjectAttribute: Popover position corrected when opened from ObjectAttribute active text
ObjectHeader: ObjectHeader and IconTabBar 2-Way-Binding issue fixed
Panel: Header is now displayed even without text specified
Panel: Header is now displayed when there is no headerText, only when expandable
Popover: Content is now displayed properly when the device changes its orientation
Popover: ResponsiveGridLayout is now correctly displayed when visibility is binded
Popover: Preferred position corrected
Popover: Popover is now closed when beforeClose event is fired
Popover: reposition from check docking should be executed in the same way with from resize handler
ResponsivePopover: Clone method is now passed to the internal control
Select: Broken change event corrected
SplitContainer: Infinite loop no longer occurs after a page in SplitContainer is moved to another control's aggregation
Table: Now respects selection mode while calculation colspan of group headers
UploadCollection: Correct icon preview is displayed in case of capitalized file extensions
UploadCollection: Edit issue with deleted file name resolved
UploadCollection: Event _onUploadComplete provides status corrected
TextArea: Now converts carriage returns correctly
FacetFilter: Translation issue resolved
MultiInput: Make expanded multi-line MultiInput working inside SimpleForm
QuickView: Width setter corrected
UploadCollection: Data is now displayed correctly when data binding is refreshed
sap.m.MessagePopover - Static setter for default async handlers added
sap.m.UploadCollection: Enablement of overwriting the label of the attachments list.
sap.ui.core.Icon: noTabStop property for not adding tabindex to
sap.m.Button: prevent icon tooltip when "type" is set
sap.m.ColumnListItem: Column visibility index should be updated when cells are not rendered.
sap.m.ComboBox: fix name clashes issue in xml view
sap.m.ListBase: No data text should only be visible when there is no items after loading.
sap.m.MessagePopover: Adding classes now works
sap.m.MessagePopover: Collapsed state is restored after closing and reopening
sap.m.RadioButton: Make outline consistent in FireFox
sap.m.SplitContainer: master can't be open again after switching modes
sap.m.TileContainer: Upon theme or orientation change tile dimensions are updated now.
sap.m.Tokenizer: fix token truncation after navigation action
sap.m.UploadCollection: Extend dependencies to improve stability.
sap.m.UploadCollection: Header parameter duplication removed.
sap.m.UploadCollection: Second renaming is working again.
sap.m.Popover: Typo in explored app corrected
sap.m.OverflowToolbar - handling of special button types
sap.m.SegmentedButton: Buttons positioning in HCB theme
sap.m.BusyDialog: Add accessibility support
sap.m.QuickView: Icons screen reader support is improved
m.Dialog: Remove DOM when hiding dialog
sap.m.Button: Fix wrong style of the focus state on mobile (HCB Theme)
sap.m.Carousel: Prevent icon tooltip
sap.m.DateRangeSelection: Control key should be allowed
sap.m.Dialog: All immediate children will now be aligned to the middle
sap.m.Dialog: Prevent icon tooltip
sap.m.Dialog: the content size is now expanded correctly
sap.m.GrowingEnablement: Multiple services should not be called when binding is refreshed
sap.m.IconTabFilter: Prevent default icon tooltip
sap.m.IconTabHeader: Prevent default icon tooltip
sap.m.IconTabSeparator: Prevent default icon tooltip
sap.m.Input: Value help for read-only inputs
sap.m.InputBase: Do not try to retain value when DOM is not exist.
sap.m.Link: Now updates href property on setting to enabled state
sap.m.MessagePage: Prevent icon tooltip
sap.m.P13nDialog - Exception is fixed clicking on OK button in explored example
sap.m.PullToRefresh: Prevent default icon tooltip
sap.m.ResponsivePopover: Clone method should clone internal popup's content aggregation
sap.m.ResponsivePopover: AriaDescribedBy added
sap.m.StandardListItem: Prevent icon tooltip
sap.m.Switch: Extending the switch should not throw an error
sap.m.TableSelectDialog: Data forwarding when dialog is open from fragment corrected
sap.m.UploadCollection: Control state will stabilized if the uploading fails.
sap.m.UploadCollection: Display of buttons for width equal 30rem corrected
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: On re-open of non-existing filter detail page, the dialog opens the parent filter page
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: The dialog is no longer flickering on iOS devices when an item is being selected
sap.m.routing.TargetHandler: Dialogs are not closed if no navigation occured
sap.m.routing.TargetHandler: Respects view levels when multiple targets are displayed
sap.m.searchField: Incorrect button state in Firefox
Unstyled sap.m.ToggleButton is incorrectly displayed
ux3.NotificationBar: Notifications are not shown
sap.m.ComboBoxBase: use native placeholder"
LocalBusyIndicator: Remove of "tabindex" Fixed
Make sap.m.App unit test more robust with IE11 (rounding height)
ManagedObject: Fixed grouping for non-string properties
sap.m.ComboBox: value is updated when calling setters on items
sap.m.ComboBoxBase: use native placeholder
sap.m.DatePicker/sap.ui.unified.calendar.Header: prevent default icon tooltip
sap.m.Dialog: Dialog now resize correctly in RTL mode
sap.m.IconTabBar: Fix left paddings
sap.m.IconTabBar: Item text can't be selected accidentally any more
sap.m.IconTabBar: Items are now rendered correctly in List
sap.m.IconTabBar: UI Consistency on "showAll" filter with horizontal design is fixed
sap.m.Input: custom suggestion value is ignored
sap.m.MultiInput: multi-line mode - value stays in MultiInput when no token is added
sap.m.MultiInput: tokenizer should be scrolled to start when multiline gets expanded
sap.m.ObjectStatus: prevent default icon tooltip
sap.m.P13nDialog - adaptation on content size change of sap.m.Dialog
sap.m.Select: fix auto close issue of the picker popup (downport)
sap.m.StandardTile: prevent default icon tooltip
sap.m.Text: Issue with newline displaying as an escaped character fixed.
sap.m.UploadCollection: Display of an icon together with a busy indicator has been removed
sap.m.UploadCollection: Style of 'Upload File' button has been corrected.
sap.m.UploadCollection: The implementation of passing on models to sub controls has been enhanced.
sap.m.UploadCollection: display of fileSize corrected
sap.ui.test.Opa - IE 9 fails when active element is called
FacetFilter remove icon issue for branch 1.30
sap.m.UploadCollection: Screen reader support improved
sap.m.ComboBox: fix error value state in compact mode
sap.m.DatePicker: disabled - right border missing in IE
sap.m.Dialog: compact header and footer are now 2.5 rem in height
sap.m.MultiInput: click value help icon in multiline multiinput
sap.m.MultiInput: scroll to top after focus out of multiline multiinput
sap.m.SplitContainer: no separator between master and detail areas
sap.m.MessageBox: Deprecation of usage of sap.ui.Control as content
sap.m.UploadCollection: Parameters of uploadTerminated event is propagated on API
sap.m.UploadCollection: The beforeUploadStarts event has been created to add header parameters for each file to be uploaded.
update of Hello World Demo App
Scrolling performance on BlackBerry 10
sap.m.Combobox: Correctly opens the Popover with control instance
sap.m.DatePicker, sap.m.DateRangeSelection: adapt API doku
sap.m.P13nXXXPanel - 'Restore' functionality for update of Sorting, Filtering and Grouping is fixed.
sap.m.Popover: Now registers itself as a child popup correctly
sap.m.Select: select type "IconOnly" is announced as button
sap.m.SplitContainer: master area should be hidden after switched to HideMode
sap.m.Switch: fix border issue at zoom in < 100%
sap.m.Title: Fixed alignments begin/end in IE and Edge browser in RTL case
sap.m.UploadCollection: Editing option of the attachment title has been corrected.
sap.m.UploadCollection: Request status after upload has been corrected.
sap.m.UploadCollectionItem: Default aggregation for WebIDE stability defined.
sap.m.semantic.SemanticPage - added missing tooltip
sap.m.sementic.SemanticPage - share menu button accessibility improved
sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: GoldReflection styling repaired
sap.m.UploadCollection: Support for termination of single upload request.
Javascript error at activeElement.tagName
sap.m.Button: run time assigned icon is not visible
sap.m.Input: suggestion list is not empty initially
sap.m.List: multi selection is not possible
sap.m.ListItemBase: change flex style to support list with Panel in CustomListItem
sap.m.MultiInput: enhance multiinput inside Grid
sap.m.TextArea: removed double line breaks
sap.m.DatePicker, sap.ui.unified.Calendar: position issues
